title: Delays on NSL due to signalling system checks

title_translations.zh-Hans: 由于信号系统检查，NSL 出现延误
title_translations.ms: Penangguhan di NSL kerana pemeriksaan sistem isyarat
title_translations.ta: சிக்னலிங் அமைப்பு சோதனைகள் காரணமாக NSL இல் தாமதங்கள்

updates.text: [NSL] UPDATE: Free regular bus & free bridging bus services between #ChoaChuKang and #Yishun have ceased.
[NSL] UPDATE: Train svcs have resumed. Free regular bus & free bridging bus services are still available between #ChoaChuKang and #Yishun.
[NSL] UPDATE: Due to signalling fault, please add 30mins travel time between #Yishun and #YewTee both bounds.
[NSL] UPDATE: Due to a signalling fault, trains btwn #Yishun & #YewTee are travelling at a slower speed. Pls seek alternative transport.
[NSL] UPDATE: Due to signalling fault, pls add 30mins travel time btw #YewTee & #Yishun both bounds. Trains are travelling at slower speed.
[NSL] Due to signalling fault btw #YewTee & #Yishun both bounds, pax are advised to take alt transport or other train lines. We are sorry.
[NSL]UPDATE:Due to signalling fault,pls add 30mins travel time between #YewTee & #Yishun both bounds.Trains are travelling at slower speed.
